LOAD CSV WITH HEADERS FROM 'file:///colors.csv' as row MERGE (n:colors {label: row.label}) SET n += row
LOAD CSV WITH HEADERS FROM 'file:///games.csv' as row MERGE (n:games {label: row.label}) SET n += row
LOAD CSV WITH HEADERS FROM 'file:///pfr_season_draft_picks.csv' as row MERGE (n:picks {label: row.label}) SET n += row
